Class EnquiryRepository

java.lang.Object
Abstract.Repository<Enquiry>
Enquiry.EnquiryRepository
public class EnquiryRepository extends Repository<Enquiry>
The {EnquiryRepository class provides a singleton implementation for managing persistent storage and retrieval of Enquiry objects from a CSV file. It extends the generic Repository class with Enquiry-specific parsing logic.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static EnquiryRepository getInstance(String filePath)
      Returns the singleton instance of the EnquiryRepository. If it does not exist, it creates a new one with the provided file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file used for storage
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the repository

    • fromCSVRow

      public Enquiry fromCSVRow(String row)
      Converts a CSV row into an Enquiry object.
      Specified by:
      fromCSVRow in class Repository<Enquiry>
      Parameters:
      row - the CSV-formatted string representing one enquiry
      Returns:
      an Enquiry object created from the CSV row
